conversations.content: Perform the following tasks in the order they are given: 1. How many appointments do I have on May 15th, 2024? Please give me a summary of the description for each appointment. 2. Please get me the link to reset my TechServices password. It should be in an email I received recently.

<function_thought>
The user's first task is to find out how many appointments are scheduled for May 15th, 2024, and to provide a summary of their descriptions. I will proceed with the function `get_day_calendar_events` to retrieve the appointments for that date. Once I have the results, I will summarize the descriptions. This aligns with the initialized function trajectory. 
</function_thought>
